name: Vacuum pack (human corpse)
description: A vacuum pack of plastic packaging containing human corpses. I can open it and take it out...

use_action.msg: You open the vacuum pack, exposing it to the atmosphere.

name: piece of meat (Time Stopped)
description: It is a piece of meat that has been stopped for a while. It never decays, but it can not be eaten in this condition. You can use it to return to a state suitable for eating by canceling the time stop.

use_action.msg: I canceled the time stop so that I could eat the piece of meat.

description: It is a piece of human flesh that has been stopped for a while. It never decays, but it can not be eaten in this condition. You can use it to return to a state suitable for eating by canceling the time stop.

use_action.name: bag of mulitvitamins
use_action.description: It is a bag containing tablets of multivitamin tablets. You can take out the contents by opening it.

use_action.msg: You opened the bag and took out the tablets.

use_action.name: bag of gummy vitamins
use_action.description: It is a bag containing gummy vitamins. You can take out the contents by opening it.

use_action.msg: I opened the bag and took out the gummy vitamins.

use_action.name: buckwheat soba
use_action.description: It is a soba cutler that you can enjoy Japanese taste by swallowing with delicious soup. It's very delicious, it would be perfect for a hot summer with a simple cup to eat cold.

use_action.name: buckwheat soba
use_action.description: It is a soba cut that you can enjoy the taste of Japan to swallow with delicious soup. It is a simple one with no side dishes, but it is very delicious.

use_action.name: human meat soba
use_action.description: It is a soba cut that you can enjoy the taste of Japan to swallow with delicious soup. A bite-sized human meat is on board and it is very delicious.

use_action.name: meat soba
use_action.description: It is a soba cut that you can enjoy the taste of Japan to swallow with delicious soup. The bite-sized meat is on board and it is very delicious.

use_action.name: cabbage soba
use_action.description: It is a soba cut that you can enjoy the taste of Japan to swallow with delicious soup. Fresh vegetables are on board and it is very delicious.

use_action.name: tempura soba
use_action.description: It is a soba cut that you can enjoy the taste of Japan to swallow with delicious soup. The hot tempura is served and it's very delicious.

use_action.name: cold ramen with human meat
use_action.description: It is a Japanese human meat dish that is based on Chinese noodles. It is a cold ramen to be eaten entwined with noodles in a savory soup.

use_action.name: cold ramen
use_action.description: It is a Japanese cuisine that is based on Chinese noodles. It is a cold ramen to be eaten entwined with noodles in a savory soup.

use_action.name: ramen jiro with human meat
use_action.description: It is a ramen created by Takumi Yamada, consisting of thick noodles, thick human bone soup, and human flesh char. I made something close to something with limited ingredients after the end of the world. It's difficult to eat completely, but it's a very addictive taste that makes you want to eat it again.

use_action.name: ramen jiro
use_action.description: It is a ramen created by Mr. Takumi Yamada consisting of thick noodles, thick soup, and oversized chash. I made something close to something with limited ingredients after the end of the world. It's difficult to eat completely, but it's a very addictive taste that makes you want to eat it again.

use_action.name: ramen with human meat
use_action.description: It is a Japanese cuisine that is based on Chinese noodles. There are various characteristics for each area and store, and it can not be expressed with ramen in one bite. This ramen is produced with limited ingredients after the end of the century, and the taste is totally different every time. It is very delicious that the noodles with Koshi are entwined in hot heat soup.

use_action.name: ramen
use_action.description: It is a Japanese cuisine that is based on Chinese noodles. There are various characteristics for each area and store, and it can not be expressed with ramen in one bite. This ramen is produced with limited ingredients after the end of the century, and the taste is totally different every time. It is very delicious that the noodles with Kosi are entwined with the hot soup.

use_action.name: karaage with plum flavor
use_action.description: It is deep-fried chicken with a delicious plum-flavored sauce. The affinity with rice is excellent and the rice goes on.

use_action.name: karaage
use_action.description: It is a delicious deep-fried fish. The affinity with rice is excellent and the rice goes on.

use_action.name: Rice ball (ume)
use_action.description: It is a healthy and delicious rice ball with umeboshi in a round-bowled rice. By the bactericidal action by plum, it lasts longer than the state of white rice.

use_action.name: Boiled fish with plum
use_action.description: It is a stewed dish rich in acidity with a refreshing plum flavor. It is also good to have it as a snack of sake.

use_action.name: takenoko with soil
use_action.description: It is a freshly picked bamboo shoot. Since the soil is on it, it's best to not eat it.

use_action.msg: I swept off the soil. Now you can cook it.

use_action.name: takenoko
use_action.description: It is a freshly picked bamboo shoot. The freshly picked ones can be eaten raw.

use_action.name: dried menma
use_action.description: It is a comfortable menma with a unique touch. It needs to be rehydrated for a week to eat, as it has been dried for storage.

use_action.name: Menma (salted)
use_action.description: It is Menma that has been sufficiently fermented. Let's be dried in the sun to make it dry.

use_action.name: Menma (during salting)
use_action.description: Fresh bamboo shoots are boiled, cut into pieces of appropriate size and then salted. Fermented for about 1 to 2 months and dried in the sun will give you a delicious, dried noodle.

use_action.msg: Fermentation advanced enough. Let's be sun-dried.
use_action.not_ready_msg: Fermentation has not progressed sufficiently yet.

use_action.name: takenoko with meat
use_action.description: It is a simple dish that stirs up meat and bamboo shoots. The crunchy texture of this bamboo shoot is extremely compatible.

use_action.name: chikuzenni with human meat
use_action.description: It is a sweet and spicy, end-of-the-century stew dish. It is the best dish to catch while cramming a skull.

use_action.name: chikuzenni
use_action.description: It is a sweet and savory, flavorful stewed dish. It is also good to have it as a snack of sake.

use_action.name: takenoko with rice
use_action.description: The chopsticks do not stop in exquisite harmony with the rice that is soaked in the flavor and smell of bamboo shoots.

use_action.name: harvested rice
use_action.description: A bunch of reaped rice. You need to dry and thresh to eat.

use_action.name: Sake moromi
use_action.description: It is a blend of rice, rice bran and water. When fermented, it will be sake.

use_action.name: doburoku
use_action.description: It is old-fashioned Japanese sake made from persimmon and rice. You can enjoy the taste of freshly brewed rice grains are sinking in a bowl shape.

use_action.name: nigori
use_action.description: It is turbid liquor that white sediment has accumulated in the bottom. Although only the supernatant is delicious, you can enjoy a different taste by mixing it with the sediment and drinking it.

use_action.name: sake
use_action.description: It is a clear, filtered liquor. Even on distant lands across the sea, the taste of sake gives us a sense of peace of mind.

use_action.name: grilled meat with herbs
use_action.description: A rustic dish of fresh grilled meat with a herb and garlic flavor.

use_action.name: grilled human meat with herbs
use_action.description: It is a rustic dish with fresh meat and meat flavored with herbs and garlic.

use_action.name: Blood sausage
use_action.description: A sausage stuffed with fresh blood and meat. It tastes like the liver's flavor has been thickened, and it goes quite well.

use_action.name: human blood sausage
use_action.description: It is a sausage stuffed with fresh blood and meat. It tastes like the liver's flavor has been thickened, and it goes quite well.

use_action.name: human blood pudding
use_action.description: It is a pudding made of blood and also of caramel sauce. The rich bloody taste is invaluable for those with a taste for that hand.

use_action.name: Stir-fry of wild vegetables
use_action.description: A rustic dish of fresh greens with herbs and garlic flavor.

use_action.name: pomegranate
use_action.description: It is a delicious fruit with sour taste. As an aside, in the creative world, pomegranate seems to be treated as a product for cutting food preferences.

use_action.name: irradiated pomegranate
use_action.description: An irradiated pomegranate will remain edible nearly forever.  Sterilized using radiation, so it's safe to eat.
